title: Regulating intermediate adsorption and H2O dissociation on a diatomic catalyst to promote electrocatalytic nitrate reduction to ammonia
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6717-6727
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02747G, Paper
Xiaoxue Zhang, Xiaokang Liu, Zhen-Feng Huang, Li Gan, Shishi Zhang, Ru Jia, Muhammad Ajmal, Lun Pan, Chengxiang Shi, Xiangwen Zhang, Guidong Yang, Ji-Jun Zou
Cu–Fe–N–C demonstrates excellent electrocatalytic activity for nitrate reduction by optimizing intermediate adsorption and generating a substantial supply of H* for the thorough hydrogenation of the N-containing intermediates.
